body.raw: Creation of the portal becas.gob.do used by more than 200,000 Dominican and international citizens to apply for national and international scholarships.Development of the back-office used by dozens of institutions in the Dominican Republic to create, configure, manage, publish and approve scholarships for citizens who apply for them.
body.html: Creation of the portal becas.gob.do used by more than 200,000 Dominican and international citizens to apply for national and international scholarships.Development of the back-office used by dozens of institutions in the Dominican Republic to create, configure, manage, publish and approve scholarships for citizens who apply for them.
